alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:38PM MST until February 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM Wednesday: Doney Park 5 to 9 inches Flagstaff 9 to 13 inches Forest Lakes 9 to 15 inches Heber-Overgaard 4 to 8 inches Williams 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
